amendment.description: Amendment sought to make available $2 million from Bureau of Census program funding to create a report that augments Hispanic origin data from the 2000 census.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Census Bureau by $2 million in order to faciltate more accurate counting of Hispanic subgroups.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 215 - 215 (Roll no. 240).
